name: Ninja Zombies Hunter
description:
This Zombies games, the most expert Ninja wants to kill all the zombies.

Destroy zombies.

Get the Gold so much as you can.

Kill the Giant Zombie.

FEATURES?

- Throw your ninja weapon against different zombies.

- Avoid all the dangers (lava...)

- Get instant power-ups

- Share your score with your friends through leaderboards

- There are Progressive challenge!

- There are Achievements and more!
